Capturing enemies not only strengthens your ranks but fuels the undying resolve within, allowing your army to recover all movement.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Barbaric Fervour[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Secondary Resource[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] When in constant wars and battles, gain powerful bonuses.\\n[[col:red]]-[[/col]] When not in wars and battles, generals begin to want more.\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The people of the Han call you "uncivilised", "primitive" or "barbaric." [[b]]Captain Retinues[[/b]]\\n\\nInstead of heroic characters, the tribes can employ lower-ranked officers and captains who lead retinues of various unit compositions.\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Leading their men as first amongst equals, captains will follow your orders without hesitation.[[/col]][[/i]]
